$ORIGIN MYDOMAIN.COM.
$TTL 3600
@	IN	SOA	NS1.NAMESERVER.NET.	HOSTMASTER.MYDOMAIN.COM.	(
			1406291485	 ;serial
			3600	 ;refresh
			600	 ;retry
			604800	 ;expire
			86400	 ;minimum ttl
)

@	NS	NS1.NAMESERVER.NET.
@	NS	NS2.NAMESERVER.NET.

@	MX	0	mail1
@	MX	10	mail2

@	A	127.0.0.1
www	A	127.0.0.1
mail	A	127.0.0.1
			A 1.2.3.4
tst 300 IN A 101.228.10.127

@	AAAA	::1
mail	AAAA	2001:db8::1

mail1	CNAME	mail
mail2	CNAME	mail

treefrog.ca. IN TXT "v=spf1 a mx a:mail.treefrog.ca a:webmail.treefrog.ca ip4:76.75.250.33 ?all"
treemonkey.ca. IN TXT "v=DKIM1\; k=rsa\; p=MIGf..."
